name: Simple Simon for iPad
description:
Simple Simon is a fun and simple memory game. Watch as one of the colors light up one at a time, and repeat the sequence of colors. The more you get right the more colors will light up and the sequence will get longer each round. Be careful, one wrong tap and it's game over. Has your brain met its match?

Test your IQ and boost your memory with this great game of memory challenge.

See the leaderboards to know how you compare against your friends and against others around the world.

How to Play this game of colors:
1. Start the game.
2. Watch one of the colors light up.
3. Press that color.
4. Watch the same color light up plus new random color.
5. Press the same color pattern in the same order.
6. Repeat and see how far your memory will take you.

Share it with your friends and beat them in this color brain game! See how they did in the leaderboard and try to be number 1 in the world!
